climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: EWG VERIFIED PRODUCTS, USA MANUFACTURED & THE ONLY CERTIFIED PALM OIL FREE PURE CASTILE LIQUID SOAP UNSCENTED antibacterial soap ON AMAZON. Our castile soap unscented is a mild formula free of essential oils and 2-3x more concentrated than regular soaps and cleansers! More fragrance-free soap per bottle means less waste in packaging! As a concentrate, it’s easy to dilute and still remain effective! Available in a convenient 64 oz bottle (1/2 gallon).

CERTIFIED ORGANIC. Our original Nature's Gold Castile is made with Organic plant-based ingredients. Sustainable ingredients & Supply Chain transparency. Our Castille Soap produces a luxurious lather without synthetic preservatives, thickeners, or foaming agents—which is good for the environment & great for your skin - only pure, fully-biodegradable plant oils transformed into pure soap.

ORGANIC BLEND OF PRICKLY PEAR, ARGAN, JOJOBA, ORGANIC COCONUT OIL, OLIVE OIL CASTILE, ALMOND & HEMP OILS. Our special formula contains luxury oils that are a source of vitamins, antioxidants, and Omega fatty acids to create the ultimate hypoallergenic skincare solution leaving your skin smooth and hydrated, without clogging your pores. For dryness, eczema, psoriasis, or acne-prone skin! Castle soap Is exactly what your skin needs to be feeding!

NON-GMO, CRUELTY-FREE & VEGAN THIRD-PARTY CERTIFIED. Whole Natural's Liquid Soaps are 100% biodegradable & use a natural soap base and vegan ingredients that pose no threat to the environment. Our products & ingredients are never tested on animals & are cruelty-free. We are so confident that you’ll love using your Nature’s Gold Liquid Castile Soap from the moment it arrives, or we’ll refund every cent. Order Now!

ECONOMICAL MULTIPURPOSE ORGANIC SOAP! Castillo soap liquid can be used to clean everything! buy castile soap bulk! Use it as a Household cleaning, unscented body wash natural, shampoo, natural hand soap, face soap, body soap liquid window cleaner, laundry soap liquid, Baby wash, detergent floor cleaner, baby dish soap liquid, or washing pets. Each order comes with a FREE recipe E-book to create your own perfect formula!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality soap
reviews.reviewText: I couldn’t find my usual face and hand soap in stock so I tried this one. I am sold on it. It doesn’t dry my skin out but doesn’t feel overly moisturized either. It cleans well, rinses off easily and a little goes a long way. Since it comes in a jug you have to use your own method for dispensing. I actually bought a small dispenser pump that I poured it into and just use a little squirt. It is virtually odorless and I like that because I do not like added ingredients on my skin that it doesn’t need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely good product
reviews.reviewText: This product works great and is way cheaper than other brand I was using. I love it most as hand wash and body wash but may try others things later. I add distilled water, vitamin E oil, liquid coconut oil, and fragrance essential oils. It turns out really wonderful and is so good for skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars King of Versatility
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried Wholenaturals Castile Soap, and I'm truly impressed! Its versatility amazed me - from gentle body wash to an effective household cleaner, this soap does it all. The natural ingredients leave my skin feeling refreshed, and its eco-friendly formula aligns perfectly with my values. A must-have for anyone seeking a multipurpose, quality product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe non toxic ingredients
reviews.reviewText: Love that this is family owned, and made with safe natural Ingredients for my family and I. I make my own hand soaps at home. This has a good feel on my hands after washing and can be mixed with any scent and I also add fractionated coconut oil into my soaps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Ingredients List
reviews.reviewText: Have not tried it yet but so far it has arrived timely and nicely packaged. The ingredient list is great. Will give it a try tonight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile high quality soap
reviews.reviewText: This Castile soap is extremely versatile and high quality at a good price! We use it for everything from hand soap, to pet shampoo, to washing our produce, and even on our garden plants to reduce the amount of flies on our citrus trees with a safe, natural product instead of harmful pesticides. It works wonders and I would recommend it to everyone considering the product. You won’t be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not sure how I can give a rating when I just purchased this item but I am going to use it for everything! I love that it is family owned, environment friendly, it comes with 40 tips, and can be used on skin and to clean household items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Value Quality Product!
reviews.reviewText: We have converted our household to WHOLENATURALS Pure Castile Soap. What we like best is that this product is versatile, non-toxic, and gentle on our skin and the environment!
